segments.text: I see the angled view of the kitchen, with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours over in a sheet, hitting the floor with a splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot already wet from the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then, to the left, the boy on the stool catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's tipped slightly, hand deep in the cookie jarâ€”how bold!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs splay out, threatening to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, her open palm expectant for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating this sneaky grab without the woman knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, totally at odds with the interior frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected such hidden dangers in this ordinary scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
